doc.name: segment
doc.summary: Designates a space-delimited or quoted string as part of a chunk expression.

examples.example: get last segment of the long name of this stack

description.overview: Use the segment keyword to refer to one or more words in a container.
description.comments:
A segment is delimited by one or more spaces, tabs, or returns, or enclosed by double quotes. A single segment can contain multiple characters and multiple items, but not multiple lines.
Segments are delimited by double quotes ("), but not by curved quotes (""). LiveCode does not treat curved quotes as quotes.
